original_text: Now if the ministry of death, carved in letters on stone, came with such glory that the Israelites could not gaze at Moses' face because of its glory, which was being brought to an end,
korean_text: 돌에 써서 새긴 죽게 하는 율법 조문의 직분도 영광이 있어 이스라엘 자손들은 모세의 얼굴의 없어질 영광 때문에도 그 얼굴을 주목하지 못하였거든

sentences.original_text: Now if the ministry of death,
that the Israelites could not gaze at Moses' face
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 사람들이 모세의 얼굴을 주목할 수 없었으니,

sentences.original_text: which was being brought to an end,
